note:
retired software engineer, volunteer for environmental causes, wanna-be inventor.
grand opening policy: one free Follow for each journalist, scientist, engineer or doctor kicked off of Twitter when and as I learn of your refugee status.

fields.name: I could reprogram your museum
fields.value: Python, Java, C, Bliss, Fortran, Pascal, VB.  IBM360, PDP-11,  8086, 68000, Data General. RSTS, RSX, Unix, Solaris, Windows...ugh I am getting a cramp.

fields.name: But what about
fields.value: physics, paleontology, climate, environment, plastics, fossil fuels, money in politics
